glsa.title: WeeChat: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Two vulnerabilities have been found in WeeChat, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Wee Enhanced Environment for Chat (WeeChat) is a light and extensible console IRC client.

description.p: Two vulnerabilities have been discovered in WeeChat:

ul.li: The hook_process() function does not properly handle shell expansions (CVE-2012-5534).
WeeChat does not properly decode colors which could cause a heap-based buffer overflow (CVE-2012-5854).

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted script or send messages with specially crafted colors, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
